Diaeta Clinic at Espace Pluridys, Uccle

Address

Dieweg 99, 1180 Uccle, Brussels

Consultation Hours (Pierre Abou-Zeid)

  • Wednesday : 14:00 - 20:00

Consultations every Wednesday.

For precise availability, please consult the appointment booking module.

Access & Information

Free parking available in front of the center.

Services Offered at this Location

  • Personalized programs for sustainable weight loss
  • Nutritional management of type 2 diabetes
  • Cholesterol and hypertension management
  • Support for Irritable Bowel Syndrome (Low FODMAP approach)
  • Nutrigenomics consultations (on request)
  • And other personalized dietary follow-ups...

All consultations at Espace Pluridys are provided by Pierre Abou-Zeid, a certified Dietitian-Nutritionist (INAMI) and MONASH certified.

Discover Pierre's expertise

Diaeta welcomes you to Espace Pluridys (Uccle) to support you in achieving your health and wellness goals.
